history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00069
FULL TITLE : COLLECTIVE INVESTMENT SCHEMES LAW
SHORT TITLE : Collective Investment Schemes Law
ABSTRACT : Establishes a comprehensive regulatory and tax framework for all collective investment schemes (CIS) on products which will eventually lead to a more competitive environment for the CIS industry and provide enhanced and uniform levels of protection to the investing public.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALCEDA, JOEY SARTE
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Co (004 2016-08-01)2. Garbin (004 2016-08-01)
3. Batocabe (004 2016-08-01)4. Nieto (002 2017-07-25)
